BREMEN shUt uP my InNerjEsus --------------------------------- Has anyone read the comic Bremen. Awesome, it's japan thing but don't shut it out cause of that. It's more american independent kinda thing. It's about 4 guys starting a band to be gods of rock. One is this extremise who's going to find his dream. the other Reji has a huge red mowhawk and wants to be a musician he's bit over passinate about his dream and sensable but i love him anyway. 3rd is a crossdresser Ryo he/she is the drummer he's .... got problems ... but is really entertaining.last is ran the bass player. he's the oldest of the group and thought of the name Bremen for the band. He was in some drug cult thing. The whole comic was mostly molded around punk rock and give a vibe of Tank Girl ( movie not comic). If you look up Toriyama's world you'll go to manga and download the comic i genrally like it though it has it's flaws. If you hate it well then well ...fuck you.

CLOTHE HANGERS ARE MORE ENTERTAINING THAN ME shUt uP my InNerjEsus ----------------------------------- Not to long ago Montana spent the night I put toothpaste in her drink , she poured it on me , I went back to sleep. The End.

TO WHITE TO DO THE TONGUE ROLL shUt uP my InNerjEsus --------------------------------- Hello , montana in the hizza. Have you ver been sitting around ontop of the parks dugout roof and and of a sudden theres some guy behind a tree and you just ask them who the hell are you while trying to guide your friend from down the roof. Yeah well thats what happned to me and Montana tonight at the park. It was around 9:30 10. We sitting on the dugout roof when i jump down and theres some police man behind a tree what the hell is that about.Well at frist I'm just like it's just some teenager fucking with or heads so i didn't care after a few minutes I finally say "Um m=Montana theres some weirdo behind a tree so he comes out and just shines the light in my eyes thanks buck no really i like the dancing light asshole.He takes down all my info not Montana's after awhile we start to wonder okay ... is this guy a real cop. well after phoning the police we booked it home.more pissed off then worrid.But thats just the frist part of the day Frist we went to the mall with Andrew i had to buy a red bull to get him to come , and come to thinnk of it that's pretty american.Well, i had to do it he's my ride home. *qoutes of the day-* Montana- " To white to do the tongue roll" ferris bullers day off - "the Walrus was cool I could be the Walrus, But that wouldn't change the fact i would have to bum rides from people"

BEHAVE, AND BEALIVE IS THE MISSION shUt uP my InNerjEsus #2 ------------------------------------------ Human nature is a strange thing , no? Have you ever been a kid. They can never find the one thing that can make them whole. They can never say that their happy at where there at now. Selling out has a big thing to it. something beutiful but not past their lovely morals. Hey, let's find someplace that won't say no.

shUt uP my InNerjEsus ---------------------------- ANDREW WAS OUT OF IT TODAY JUST LIKE ME HE WAS JUST SORTA FLOATING.MONTANA LOST HER NEW YEARBOOK TO SOME BITCH ASS PORTORICAIN. AS FOR ME I WAS JUST SORTA STARING AT THE SUN IF I SEEM BLEAK YOU WOULD BE CORRECT. TODAY WAS JUST LIKE THAT SONG FROM OFFSPRING (damn caps lock) offspring staring at the sun Maybe life is like a ride on a freeway Dodging bullets while you're trying to find your way Everyone's around, but no one does a damn thing It brings me down, but I won't let them If I seem bleak Well you'd be correct And if I don't speak It's cause I can't disconnect But I won't be burned by the reflection Of the fire in your eyes As you're staring at the sun When I ran I didn't feel like a runaway When I escaped I didn't feel like I got away There's more to living than only surviving Maybe I'm not there, but I'm still trying Though you hear me I don't think that you relate My will is something That you can't confiscate So forgive me, but I won't be frustrated By destruction in your eyes As you're staring at the sun trully felt that way today it might be my fault that nobody really understands the fcat that i'm trying but i guess it's my fault i'm not representing my feelings well enough. you ever get the feeling that your completly cut off. like everyone has some sort of dream but you don't have squat. Some peoples dream is to have a dream. do you really have enough time to do that look for a dream and find it and then start at it from there it could take awhile but i guess just finding it would be the funiest right ... i guess my dream is to have more fun than anyone else. fun what a stupid word. *today's haikus* In the corridor he's walking past my front door he's hating even more In the corridor he's pent up in the pent house he's forgetting more In the corridor he's scared of the next open door he trembles even more I'd give him a shove but he might mistake the love so i wave from shore --------- alternate ending I'm watching him go with parents i don't really know but i'm trusting them

today's Haikus --- Ps sorry my haikus make zero sense heh heh no peace from the dreams don't howl my sweet beutiful queen stained glass toes between ---- if youv'e ever read the manga Hunter+hunter you'll know what i'm talking about i just kind of like the subject Gon--- reinforcement nen simple but so hard to bend curiosity killua----- lollypop, kind guy mood swings, grove swing, blood spills guy much to young to die

i've been trying to get my picture on this profile of mine but sadly ... the computers retarded.People always use that excuse to pretend it's not their fault i love it!! *scratch ass* I went to wet 'n wild and particullarly being wet ain't that wild.Though there was this little tubby kid that was like 5-6 sticking his hand in his pants and just digging at his ass.At this time i was walking with a family friend Dia and she goes up to him and ask him if he found it yet.It was intertaining and i laughed cried and we all went home , today wasn't really a day for me .. I fell asleep most the time. Have I told you I'm a temporary insombiac yeah i can't sleep at night the days are pretty easy to sleep through though. __________ *------ much love to the children who i have decided even though they will grow up to be evil adults they deserve a little more apreciation and so even though i have a gruge against god and some well choosen followers *coug cough jawouba wittness cough* i trust he'll at least not be an ass to lil kids who rock cause they can dig down in their pants for buried treasure and just not care and i salute that dearly with luv to the people who toke time to read this Kc

WENSEDAY TO THURSDAY shUt uP my InNerjEsus --------------------------- Wenseday, I went to see my dear friend play at this pub Will's Pub. He started a band and got a gig this kids only 13 years old. It was a great performance he was best of the 3 bands also playing. ( not including his lil' brother playing the harmonica which was adorable ). All together I'm jealous of his pursuit to music, but I also admire it. Afterward , we went back to Montana's house and mostly watched " that 70's show" and spewed chocolate syrup out of our mouth because I brought up that be cause the movie phyco was black and white they used chocolate syrup instead of fake blood so it was coming. But it doesn't stop there at about 4:00 in the morning ( still watching that 70's show ) we saw this huge pile of brownies on TV and montana's just like " I .... Want ..... Brownies ". The next day we walk 4 miles to publix, walk 4 miles back and make a ass load of brownies and ate them in one sitting and it was delicious THE END
shUt uP my InNerjEsus -------------------------- we are kid's who raise ourselves

KIDES, STAY IN SCHOOL shUt uP my InNerjEsus --------------------------------- Last semester quarter I had 2 d's. I'm not aloud to get any d's so of course the only logical thing to do is change those d's to c's. Thus was done and i got through the rest of the school year untouched and emotionally stable go me. To bad they list the grasdes your got last semester on the report card. Now my parents have kicked me out of my school. I have 2 months to brib, beg , and threaten to get back into school. Wish me luck

PROTECT YOUR NUTS shUt uP my InNerjEsus -------------------------------- Recently I went to the beach. Big hotel. friends came with me. hotel room looking over the hot tub where digusting fat hairy Italian men hung out at. Well, luckly every once and awhile a good looking boy will be in there. Kiwi ( not her real name ) a boy crazy slut of a cousin, decide hey look theres a good looking guy in the spa. Me who also thought the boy to be good looking but also one of the biggest socially inapt guy I've seen here meaning intrest was small for me. But hey bad table manners won't stop kiwi ( which is also probally the reason she's had lots of boyfriends and i havn't had one ... I'm such a bitch ). I'm eating nut out of a can and kind just watching him. Kiwi tries to get him to notice by knocking the nuts out of my hands ( just to pour some ) to bad i'm a butter fingers and drop the whole can. " MY NUTS YOU BITCH " Kiwi laughing ran to the other room. I chased her screaming MY NUTS! When we decided to go back to the balcony the hot board shorted boy was pissed. Nuts had gone every where. " You hurt that boy " he yells up at us. I look and there's this little boy holding his eye. oh fuck. the dad was pretty pissed too. that day we learned that trying to get a boy's attention with a can of nuts is fun intill one hits some random boy in the eye.

urlLink "So why did I do it? I could offer a million answers, all false. The truth is that I'm a bad person, but that's going to change, I'm going to change. This is the last of this sort of thing. I'm cleaning up and I'm moving on, going straight and choosing life. I'm looking forward to it already. I'm going to be just like you; the job, the family, the fucking big television, the washing machine, the car, the compact disc and electrical tin opener, good health, low cholesterol, dental insurance, mortage, starter home, leisurewear, luggage, three piece suite, DIY, game shows, junk food, children, walks in the park, nineto-five, good at golf, washing the car, choice of sweaters, family Christmas, indexed pension, tax exemption, clearing the gutters, getting by, looking ahead, the day you die." urlLink
PEOPLE ARE CHANGING I TOLD THE OLD MAN

WALK AWAY ME BOYS, as my eyesight fades like that old song. shUt uP my InNerjEsus ---------------------------------- This is yesterday, humor me bobby sue. I stroll over to my friends 13th birthday ........ She likes to pretend she's turning 2 , that was the theme, though she called it rainbow theme, I think. Montana has the habit of picking things out 10 times earlier than it happens, She said " Even with a party of like 10 people there's clicks" me thinking that this was pure superstition thought "nah, people only hate eachother till they met". the story goes untold. Toward the end of the party cake was introduced to the lil' punklings. The smearing began. I walk into the bathroom where there was already one in progress between, heather and evelin. I throw Dr. Pepper at Evelin as Heather ran out. We shut the door thinking oh shit somebodies gonna hate us for this and blame is for squares ( Really the Dr. Pepper looked like someone had the runs ) .WE grab toilet pepper and just confitty it everywhere intill Evelin accidentally drops the toilet roll into the toilet. We look for the and extra could only find tampons in my mind I'm just like " Oh god wouldn't that be funny". In the end the mess soaked up and deposed of in a decent manor ( only a few tampons were used). And when people barged in demanding what the 2 of us were doing I said " uuuuh we were just making out". If lifes not beautiful without the pain, then I rather never ever see beauty ever again. - Modest Mouse

URINE SAMPLE shUt uP my InNerjEsus --------------------------------------- I can't belive the days I've lived. I can't belive I'm not dead yet. And I'm just waiting for a bullet to the head.

A clockwork orange shUt uP my InNerjEsus ------------------------------------ Yeah I watched that. loved it. almost barfed. i danced. i listened to 73 1/2 of Alex's rambeling. and in the end i converted over to being jewish for no aparent reason. For those who don't know "a clockwork orange" is an old 70's flick about a young boy who is charmingly insane. With his chums he rids the world of guzzeling bums. And rape's women like atela the hun. But oh it's nothing done if he was not picked up by cops But he is for what he does and going to the pictures never made him oh so sick. This is one film thats hard to relate to so it's increrdabliy strange.And rated X. .................. i highly recomended it

THE FEAR OF BEING PLAIN CAN DRIVE YOU QUITE INSANE. shUt uP my InNerjEsus --------------------------- Yesterday i went to my cousins traditional 4th of july. Kiwi was playing elimidsate with 2 boy toys that i called homos not to long ago at school.And so to advoid an awkward conversation about the things i've said to his friends, I decided that the safist route was to hang with my brother and down to earth cousin. This is the frist time I've ever really talked to my brother in years and found he hasn't changed at all hell he was funny.

ENOUGH shUt uP my InNerjEsus ----------------------------------- Summer sucks. I've watched the same reruns of every channel 3 times. The Ashley simmson show is on but i'm to lazy to get up and turn it off. I just keep listening to the obsessive whining of this girl that can't sing worth crap. And with that i have found the power to get up and turn it off may the devil be your judge
